87ee7475-8cad-4cab-bc08-517a57a2b9e4.plaintext: Content within each section of the accordion is dynamically loaded when expanded, reducing initial page load times, which is especially useful for content-heavy pages.

children.text: Content within each section of the accordion is dynamically loaded when expanded, reducing initial page load times, which is especially useful for content-heavy pages.

8cca84b5-c601-4468-bc76-567a1998a24b.plaintext: It adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes, ensuring a consistent and optimized user experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

children.text: It adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes, ensuring a consistent and optimized user experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

55b7d12f-92db-4a97-afd6-923522b21d63.plaintext: Content creators can define how many sections are opened by default, choose the alignment, and apply custom styles to match the website’s design guidelines.

children.text: Content creators can define how many sections are opened by default, choose the alignment, and apply custom styles to match the website’s design guidelines.

b5d114ad-9ff4-46ee-a691-a3a0488a2971.plaintext: The accordion block consists of multiple sections (or panels), each with a title that users can click to expand or collapse the content. This provides a clean, space-saving way to present detailed information.

children.text: The accordion block consists of multiple sections (or panels), each with a title that users can click to expand or collapse the content. This provides a clean, space-saving way to present detailed information.

352cfb33-4dc3-4dfa-90f6-ddedbc720a41.plaintext: By enabling content to be structured in a more compact way, it helps with SEO since search engines can crawl all sections of the accordion, making it easier for users to find the information they need.

children.text: By enabling content to be structured in a more compact way, it helps with SEO since search engines can crawl all sections of the accordion, making it easier for users to find the information they need.

39c65325-1915-482a-b6a0-fe7a0598160b.plaintext: It’s designed to be intuitive and easy to use for both content creators and website visitors. The block enables content editors to add multiple panels with just a few clicks.

children.text: It’s designed to be intuitive and easy to use for both content creators and website visitors. The block enables content editors to add multiple panels with just a few clicks.
